text: To be the man I know I can be, I must work for it today.
I do not fear my demons, I thank them for making me stronger.
I am the perfect man.  Through my greater self nothing escapes me.
I am immortal, the energy that composes me has always and will always exist; it just changes forms as will I.
I cannot truly create or destory anything; I can only alter its form.
I do not lose people or let things go, I simply give them back.
I do not choose the landscape my journey begins on, I choose how to traverse it.
Life is a journey where I slowly remember who I am.
Fear and excitement are the same emotion, the same reaction; it is I who determines how I feel.
I live in the moment, for I can only live it once.
I can be thankful for anything in life.
My emotions are me, I am not my emotions.
A goal I possess and the goal that all should possess is this: to raise the collective.
Every time I am broken is an opportunity to rebuild myself stronger.
My mistakes do not define me if truly redefine myself.  I determine who I am.
The human being is a metamorphosis from beast to god.  I can choose with attributes to embody.
Instead of being my greatest enemy, I can be my greatest teacher.
I believe that every person in this life can teach me something whether it is something new or reminding me of something I know.
My masks may fool others but they will not fool me.  I know the truth; I know myself.
Most people fear death even though they have never truly lived.  I live a great life and will have a good death.
I learn from my darker half but do not worship it.
Motivation is my mistress but discipline is my wife.  I remember who stands by my side unendingly.
I know what I must do, so I will do it.
There are two types of people, those who worship reality, and those who have the ability to bend it to their will.  I do not worship anything.
Hell is the regret a lesser me would feel when they see who they could have been.  Heaven is joy the perfect me feels when I see who I am.
Those who go through the motions of life are at the mercy of their destiny.  I carve my own path and have destiny at my mercy.
Wonder is the best form of humility and a quality I always posses.
I shall transcend this weak human form to my true self.
Too much light can be just as blinding as darkness.  I maintain balance between the two and have clear vision.
I am the chosen one, for I have awoken.
I learn from the past and anticipate the future, but live in the present.
I have the potential to be the greatest villain of all, but I can be the greatest hero as well.
I live my life with fortidude, each day crowned with valor and glory.
If I am suffering, chances are someone has it worse than me.  If not, I have the opportunity to push the limits of what the human being can withstand.
I encourage people's best but anticipate their worst.
Any form of discomfort I have is a chance to get stronger.
If I fail and fall down I shall enjoy the ride down.
Everything is a test that I will learn from; that I will pass.
Pain is a reminder I am alive.
I did not make the rules, I simply learn how to exploit them.
I am the all experiencing itself.  Reality bends to my will; the universe answers my beckoning.
I did not make the rules, I simply learn how to exploit them.
I remain stoic in all that I do.
Sorrow and heartbreak are reminders I am fortunate to know love and joy.
I am a master of science, an expert on engineering, and an inventor of technology.
Destiny is whatever I will to happen.
I have the ability to adapt to anything and learn everything.
All the universe is sounds and frequencies.  Whatever I do is an orchestra.
If live is but a dream then the dreams I have are reality.
